Introduction

AKMU, formerly Akdong Musician, is a talented duo of sibling musicians under YG Entertainment. The group consists of siblings Lee Chanhyuk and Lee Suhyun who won the second season of K-pop Star in 2013. They officially debuted on April 7, 2014, with their critically acclaimed album “Play,” which showcased their unique style of folk-pop and witty lyrics.
